1.heading: Perry.
1.title: Apocalypse Nerd
1.author: Peter Bagge.
notes: Complete in 6 nos.
Cover title: P. Bagge's Apocalypse Nerd.
Summary (from Skyriver): Software engineer Perry and his friend Gordo are two average suburban guys who just wanted to go camping in the North Cascade Mountains near Seattle
but Kim Jong Il had other plans. Now Seattle is a smoldering nuclear wasteland and Perry and Gordo are about to be put to the test in ways they have never imagined!
